Function Documentation

int fx_begin_dialog ( long  who,
EventListener  func,
void *  args 
)

begin the dialog function

if you want to have a dialog with somebody. invoke this function first, of course, if you not invoke this function to send a dialog, it will invoked by itself. if you will not have a dialog with somebody, you should invoke fetion_end_dialog advise: invoke this function before send a dialog to somebody,

See also:
fetion_end_dialog
Parameters:
who The somebody who you want to have a dialog
Returns:
non zero if init successfully, otherwise if fail return 0.( this function will not return 0)

send a message to somebody in a dialog

Parameters:
who The somebody who you want to send
message The content which you want to send.
Returns:
..

void fx_end_dialog ( long  who  ) 

end a dialog with somebody

if you will not have a dialog with somebody, you should invoke this function

Parameters:
who The somebody who you want to end a dialog
